RelatedSentence: BOSTON ( AP ) -- A Massachusetts man has been charged with firearms violations for allegedly attempting to bring two loaded handguns into a Boston University commencement .
BOSTON ( AP ) -- A Massachusetts man has been charged with firearms violations for allegedly attempting to bring two loaded handguns into a Boston University commencement .
Andrea Massa of Marshfield was arrested by university police at a bag check area Sunday afternoon .
Massa 's wife , Sally Jenkins , tells the Boston Herald ( bit.ly / 1jtrx8P ) her husband realized he would n't be allowed in when he saw the security area and was arrested while leaving .
